$httpBackend
***REMOVED*** in module ng

Description

HTTP backend used by the ***REMOVED*** that delegates to XMLHttpRequest object or JSONP and deals with browser incompatibilities.

You should never need to use this ***REMOVED*** directly, instead use the higher-level abstractions: $http or $resource.

During testing this implementation is swapped with mock $httpBackend which can be trained with responses.

Dependencies

  • $browser
  • $window
  • $document
